name: Black Diamond Spotter Long Sleeve Flannel Shirt - Women's
description:
Don’t let a chill set in when you're belaying or spotting or heading to the gym. In breezy boulder fields or well-shaded crags, the Spotter flannel adds thermoregulation options.Midweight flannel is a burly blend of organic cotton and hemp.Underarm gussets give you room to move.Regular fit feels just right.

        Sustainability
